field.name: summary
field.value: Validate ValidateNonEmpty comibined with Select List fails on first element instead of checking for nulls or empty values

field.name: description
field.value:
If you have a select list with ValidateNonEmpty the validate-selection rule is added. In the prototype validation library this rule just checks the first option is not selected instead of checking for null or empty values.
This isn't a good approach if every option in the list is a valid selection - i.e. there is no "Please Select" as a first option. In this scenario, the first option should be a valid one.
I've set the priority to minor as it has a very easy work around of adding a first item.
